title: Cannot login to support
body:
Game is crashing and being incredibly buggy and wierd, but I can't even login to support to submit a ticket for help.

I go to support -> submit a request -> "I have a technical problem." -> Sign In -> I login -> Automatic redirect to a webpage that says "You have been logged out. Please click here if you are not automatically transferred."

And then it transfers me back to the support home page.

This is infuriating. What do I do.

replies.body:
Hey xMatttard,

Sorry to hear about your crashing issues. Can you try the solutions in the [**Bug Splat and Game Crashes**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Riot Games Support article?
